title: You Know Him As An Actor But Jeff Goldblum Is A Musician Too
teaser: Goldblum hosts a weekly jazz show in LA with his band, The Mildred Snitzer Orchestra. For more than 15 years, he's worked that around his acting schedule. (This piece aired on May 25, 2014 on ATC.)
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
